messages.title: WORKING FOR BRITAIN
messages.content: Gordon has been working tirelessly for our area, delivering real changes for you and your family.

messages.title: BACKING THE NHS
messages.content: Gordon backs the local NHS to ensure families here continue to have access to the best quality healthcare.
